name: Space Blaster (lower third)
description:
A fun little space shooter made for the University of Tartu GDD 2021 Fall course with Unity.

Had fun experimenting with some of my new Unity assets and making this little game as enjoyable as I could (and adding way more than was asked). I thought I might as well upload it here. You can download the Windows version below if it's laggy in the web player.

Having to start from the first level if you die is "completely intentional retro game design"

The best score I could get on the last level: 11525

Art assets from OpenGameArt.org

Music by Context Sensitive
